com.microsoft.azure.storage.core

Class SharedAccessSignatureHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.storage.core.SharedAccessSignatureHelper

  • public class SharedAccessSignatureHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    RESERVED FOR INTERNAL USE. Contains helper methods for implementing shared access signatures.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • generateSharedAccessSignatureForBlob

        public static UriQueryBuilder generateSharedAccessSignatureForBlob(SharedAccessBlobPolicy policy,
                                                                   SharedAccessBlobHeaders headers,
                                                                   java.lang.String groupPolicyIdentifier,
                                                                   java.lang.String resourceType,
                                                                   java.lang.String signature)
                                                            throws StorageException
        Get the complete query builder for creating the Shared Access Signature query.
        Parameters:
        policy - The shared access policy to hash.
        groupPolicyIdentifier - An optional identifier for the policy.
        resourceType - Either "b" for blobs or "c" for containers.
        signature - The signature to use.
        Returns:
        The finished query builder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        StorageException

      • generateSharedAccessSignatureHashForBlob

        public static java.lang.String generateSharedAccessSignatureHashForBlob(SharedAccessBlobPolicy policy,
                                                                        SharedAccessBlobHeaders headers,
                                                                        java.lang.String accessPolicyIdentifier,
                                                                        java.lang.String resourceName,
                                                                        ServiceClient client,
                                                                        OperationContext opContext)
                                                                 throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                                                        StorageException
        Get the signature hash embedded inside the Shared Access Signature for blob service.
        Parameters:
        policy - The shared access policy to hash.
        headers - The optional header values to set for a blob accessed with this shared access signature.
        accessPolicyIdentifier - An optional identifier for the policy.
        resourceName - The resource name.
        client - The ServiceClient associated with the object.
        opContext - An object used to track the execution of the operation
        Returns:
        The signature hash embedded inside the Shared Access Signature.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        StorageException

      • parseQuery

        public static StorageCredentialsSharedAccessSignature parseQuery(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> queryParams)
                                                          throws StorageException
        Parses the query parameters and populates a StorageCredentialsSharedAccessSignature object if one is present.
        Parameters:
        queryParams - The parameters to parse
        Returns:
        The StorageCredentialsSharedAccessSignature if one is present, otherwise null
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        StorageException - An exception representing any error which occurred during the operation.
